wikipedia_page.main: Clive Young (31 May 1948 – 7 October 2015) was a Church of England bishop. From 1999 to 2013, he was the Anglican Bishop of Dunwich, a suffragan bishop in the Diocese of St Edmundsbury and Ipswich.

**Clive Young, 67, Anglican prelate, Bishop of Dunwich (1999–2013).

link_mentions.page: Church of St Peter and St Mary, Stowmarket
response: On 6 November 2011 the Bishop of Dunwich, Clive Young, dedicated a permanent ramp, new doors and a toilet, at the base of the tower. The main entrance to the church was thus restored to the tower.
*Clive Young, 67, British Anglican prelate, Bishop of Dunwich (1999–2013), complications from surgery.‘Inspirational’ Suffolk Bishop dies two years after retirement
